timeline.title: The Beginning - Philippine Christian University (2013)
timeline.description:
Our story started back in 2013 at Philippine Christian Universityâ€”
He is an AB English student, mahilig sa words.
She was a Political Science student, mahilig manalo sa arguments.

Clearly, destiny said: "Pag-awayin ko muna sila bago ko pag-isahin." ğŸ˜†

We became part of one big barkadaâ€”different courses, same kalokohan. Somewhere between minor subjects, group works, and endless kwentuhan, we became best friends.

timeline.title: The Confessions - Second to Fourth Year
timeline.description:
By second year, He fell in love.
He confessed.
She said NOâ€”"Best friends lang tayo, baka masira."

He tried again in third yearâ€”NO pa rin.
Then fourth yearâ€”surprise! NO ulit.
(Consistency is key daw.)

Still, we remained BFFsâ€”on and off, may tampuhan, may away, may bati, may tawa. Friendship level: tested and approved.

timeline.title: The Plot Twist - After Graduation
timeline.description:
After graduation, akala namin tapos na ang story.
Pero plot twistâ€”
He worked in a bank.
She worked in the insurance company of the same bank.
Same industry, same world, different officesâ€¦ pero same destiny.

This time, she was single.
He tried againâ€”for the final boss level.
And finallyâ€¦ YES. ğŸ¥¹ğŸ‰

timeline.title: The Official Start - March 10, 2018
timeline.description:
On March 10, 2018, the best friend officially got promoted to boyfriend.
From then on, everything made senseâ€”the laughs, the arguments, the patience, and the love that grew stronger every day.

From barkada to best friends,
from "wag na" to "ikaw na,"
from friend zone to forever.

And now, after years of love, friendship, and one very persistent guy,
we're ready to say "I do" on March 13, 2026 ğŸ˜‚â¤ï¸
